```{r setup, include=FALSE}
Pupa_Weight <- read.csv("Pupa.csv")
Pupa_Weight <- na.omit(Pupa_Weight)
```

```{r 1, include=FALSE}
Treatment <- Pupa_Weight$Treatment
Dung_Type <- Pupa_Weight$Dung_Type
Weight <- Pupa_Weight$Pupa_Weight
```

```{r 2, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
p <- ggplot(data = Pupa_Weight, aes(x = Treatment, y = Pupa_Weight))  #define the variables
p <- p + geom_boxplot()  #graph them in a boxplot
p <- p + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))  #put x-axis names at 90deg
p <- p + ylab("Pupa Weights")  #rename y-axis title
p  #show me the graph
```
